com.android.internal.view
Interface IInputContext

All Superinterfaces:
IInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
IInputContext.Stub
public interface IInputContext
extends IInterface

Interface from an input method to the application, allowing it to perform edits on the current input field and other interactions with the application.

Nested Class Summary
static class IInputContext.Stub
          Local-side IPC implementation stub class.
